full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA KHAMS GSUM DBANG SDUD KYI LHA MO RIG BYED MA KU RU KULLE LA BSTOD PA'I GLU DBYANGS SRID GSUM 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
